title: M2M Automotive Reporting Delivery Q2
description:
Description
1. Epic Description
Epic (Requirement and Scope) 
Ad hoc reporting are sophisticated reports which are requested by management or other stakeholders and require higher Developer's attention. It should be generated and manually send to required persons.
Example of currently most important provided reports are Automotive revenue data reports for Deutsche Telekom IoT GMBH.
Problem:
Currently it is not possible to provide such reports automatically due to technical reasons. Because of that, these reports are provided by developers each 2 weeks.
This should be (and will be) improved to automatically delivery as soon as we would have technical possibility to do it on both sides.{}
  Target Requirements/ User Stories:
Provide Automotive revenue data reports for Deutsche Telekom IoT GMBH.
Benefits:
Customer satisfaction because of providing important data.
Specific Deliverables  
The reports have to be send to every 1st and 16th of a month.
The data has to be sent by encrypted email.
Reports are the following:
Filename: "TMSP-TRAFFIC_Start_YYYY-MM-DD_End_YYYY-MM-DD.csv"
Filename: "Automotive-Umsatz_Start_YYYY-MM-DD.csv"
Acceptance Criteria (conditions which must be satisfied for the Epic to be accepted)
The reports is sent to every 1st and 16th of a month.
The data is sent by encrypted email.
Out of Scope
Creation of new reports, system architecture changes. BI Launchpad reports are not affected.
Dependencies 
None.
2. Technical / Solution Design / Compliance
Technical & Solution Design  
The requirement is only to provide the reports from the existing attributes and already available data in the system. No new development is required.
Compliance evaluation
Done.
3. NFR (if any)
Non functional requirements
No.
4. SLA(if any)
Service Level Agreements
N/A
acceptance_criteria: Provide Automotive revenue data reports for Deutsche Telekom IoT GMBH.
